name: JellyNoid
description:
Try a new way to relax and have a great mood!
You will need: Log, football, traps and a lot, lots of jelly!
What to do with it: Run and hit the ball with a log to destroy the jelly, but not everything is so simple, because the traps will interfere with us.
You said that it is very difficult to do? - Yes, that's why we have prepared for you an excellent game, where there is all of the above, and still wonderful music and full support for the controller. Relax by going over 15 levels! Let's start!

features:
- over 15+ different levels
- many different traps and obstacles
- relax music
- support for xbox controller
